quest.name: No Chill
journal:
A certain culinary device is in need of repairs, and the desperate look in Managingway's eyes can only portend one thing.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Speak with the Loporrit mechanic in the Carrotorium.
Deliver the requested item to the Loporrit mechanic.
objectives: Speak with the Loporrit mechanic in the Carrotorium.
Synthesize [Error]Deliver [Error] to the Loporrit mechanic.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: The cooking station has been a smashing success since its grand opening, and I couldn't be more pleased! ...Well, perhaps I could be more pleased should the others stop clambering over one another just to get a taste of Cookingway's culinary twists on the traditional carrot.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Unfortunately, his indispensable carrot chiller has broken down amidst the overwhelming demand, and many of us─myself included─wish for it to be repaired posthaste. The drop in productivity the workshop suffers in its absence is not to be borne.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Forename, have you heard? Oh, it's just awful─the carrot chiller you helped to repair has broken down again!

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: As you're aware, the cooking station's frozen beverages are the talk of the hold, and nary a soul can keep their paws off of them. Hence, the carrot chiller is─or rather was in perpetual use. Inventingway himself is seeing if he can refine the design to prevent this from happening again.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: One of our Ways in charge of overseeing repairs has already gone to inspect it, but surely the process would go faster if you were there to assist them. I urge you to meet with them in the Carrotorium as soon as you are able.

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER04702
dialogue.text: <beep> Hello! Do you have any instructions? This supporter loves instructions!

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04702
dialogue.text: What's that? You'll help me with the repairs? Oh, how very kind of you! Well then, give me just a moment to figure out how to distribute the remaining tasks.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04702
dialogue.text: Let's see here... Well, the cooling mechanism has seen better days. With your expertise, I wager you could make a suitable replacement in no time. Think you can put one together with these parts?

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04702
dialogue.text: Let's see here... Well, the chiller's insulative fabric has deteriorated a good deal, but I have all the necessary materials to stitch a few more yalms together. Think you could manage that?

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04702
dialogue.text: Let's see here... Well, the coolant for the chiller seems to have degraded. With your expertise, I wager you could make a much more effective one in no time. Think you can manage that with these ingredients?

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER04702
dialogue.text: <beep> You require materials? But you have plenty already! Just think of how those poor materials would feel if they went perpetually unused. Go on, think about it.

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER04702
dialogue.text: <beep> You require materials? But you have plenty already! Just think of how those poor materials would feel if they went perpetually unused. Go on, think about it.

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER04702
dialogue.text: <beep> You require materials? But you have plenty already! Just think of how those poor materials would feel if they went perpetually unused. Go on, think about it.

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER04702
dialogue.text: <beep> Oh, do you require additional materials? Acknowledged, acknowledged! Just give this supporter a moment to fire up its transfer protocols!

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER04702
dialogue.text: <beep> Oh, do you require additional materials? Acknowledged, acknowledged! Just give this supporter a moment to fire up its transfer protocols!

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER04702
dialogue.text: <beep> Oh, do you require additional materials? Acknowledged, acknowledged! Just give this supporter a moment to fire up its transfer protocols!

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04702
dialogue.text: If you run out of materials, the supporter beside me will be able to resupply you with whatever you need.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04702
dialogue.text: Oh, have you finished?

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04702
dialogue.text: M-My word, this is absolutely remarkable! Fine work, my friend, fine work!

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04702
dialogue.text: I will set about getting the chiller up and running again with what you've made. Pray return to Managingway and let them know it will soon be in working order!

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04702
dialogue.text: Fret not, I shall see to the carrot chiller's repairs. You need but return to Managingway and let them know it shall soon be in working order!

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Oh, that's wonderful news, Forename. It sounds like the machine will be ready much sooner than we'd anticipated. I cannot thank you enough.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Why does the carrot chiller see such fierce demand, you ask? Well, allow me to answer your question with another: how would you react to a delicious beverage comprised of pulverized chilled carrots?

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: I thought so. The staff at the cooking station can even combine your favorite carrots and blend them into an original drink to keep you alert and refreshed─or whatever else you fancy, I suppose. Hmmm, perhaps I should put in my next order sooner rather than later...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Normal-quality items crafted in the course of this quest serve no purpose and cannot be sold. It is recommended that you discard them.
